item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, I’m Daniel, I build stuff. My main interests lie in embedded IoT systems and web development. Primarily, I love working on the backend getting down and dirty with databases and server logic, but that doesn’t mean I can’t still appreciate good UX and design. When I am not tinkering with electronics or writing code, I’m probably playing in some football match somewhere. Anyway, welcome to my website! Check out my projects page if you’d like to see some of the work I’ve done!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach out to me on: Gmail Mobile
